VoiceCount: The voice count to use for the synthesizer. Cannot be changed

methods.name: CreatePatch
methods.doc: Creates a new modular synth patch between a modulation source and a set of modulation destinations

methods.name: NoteOff
methods.doc: Stop the note (will only do anything if a voice is playing with that note)

methods.name: NoteOn
methods.doc: Play a new note. Optionally pass in a duration to automatically turn off the note.

methods.name: SetAttackTime
methods.doc: Sets the envelope attack time in msec.

methods.name: SetChorusDepth
methods.doc: Sets the chorus depth

methods.name: SetChorusEnabled
methods.doc: Sets whether or not chorus is enabled.

methods.name: SetChorusFeedback
methods.doc: Sets the chorus feedback

methods.name: SetChorusFrequency
methods.doc: Sets the chorus frequency

methods.name: SetDecayTime
methods.doc: Sets the envelope decay time in msec.

methods.name: SetEnableLegato
methods.doc: Sets whether or not to use legato for the synthesizer.

methods.name: SetEnablePolyphony
methods.doc:
Sets whether or not to use polyphony for the synthesizer.
@param bEnablePolyphony Whether or not to enable polyphony for the synth.

methods.name: SetEnableRetrigger
methods.doc: Sets whether or not to retrigger envelope per note on.

methods.name: SetEnableUnison
methods.doc: Sets whether or not the synth is in unison mode (i.e. no spread)

methods.name: SetFilterAlgorithm
methods.doc: Sets the filter algorithm.

methods.name: SetFilterFrequency
methods.doc: Sets the filter cutoff frequency in hz.

methods.name: SetFilterFrequencyMod
methods.doc: Sets the filter cutoff frequency in hz.

methods.name: SetFilterQ
methods.doc: Sets the filter Q (resonance)

methods.name: SetFilterQMod
methods.doc: Sets a modulated filter Q (resonance)

methods.name: SetFilterType
methods.doc: Sets the filter type.

methods.name: SetGainDb
methods.doc: Sets the synth gain in decibels.

methods.name: SetLFOFrequency
SetLFOFrequencyMod
SetLFOGain
SetLFOGainMod
SetLFOMode
SetLFOPatch
SetLFOType
SetModEnvAttackTime
methods.doc: Sets the envelope modulator attack time in msec

methods.name: SetModEnvBiasInvert
methods.doc: Sets whether or not to invert the bias output of the envelope modulator.

methods.name: SetModEnvBiasPatch
methods.doc: Sets whether or not to modulate a param based on the envelope. Uses bias envelope output (offset from sustain gain).

methods.name: SetModEnvDecayTime
methods.doc: Sets the envelope modulator attack time in msec

methods.name: SetModEnvDepth
methods.doc: Sets the envelope modulator depth (amount to apply the output modulation)

methods.name: SetModEnvInvert
methods.doc: Sets whether or not to invert the envelope modulator.

methods.name: SetModEnvPatch
methods.doc: Sets whether or not to modulate a param based on the envelope. Uses bias envelope output (offset from sustain gain).

methods.name: SetModEnvReleaseTime
methods.doc: Sets the envelope modulator release

methods.name: SetModEnvSustainGain
methods.doc: Sets the envelope modulator sustain gain

methods.name: SetOscCents
SetOscFrequencyMod
SetOscGain
SetOscGainMod
SetOscOctave
SetOscPulsewidth
methods.doc: Sets the square wave pulsewidth [0.0, 1.0]

methods.name: SetOscSemitones
SetOscSync
methods.doc: Set whether or not to follow the phase of osc2 to osc1

methods.name: SetOscType
SetPan
methods.doc: Sets the pan of the synth [-1.0, 1.0].

methods.name: SetPitchBend
methods.doc: Sets the synth pitch bend amount.

methods.name: SetPortamento
methods.doc: Sets the synth portamento [0.0, 1.0]

methods.name: SetReleaseTime
methods.doc: Sets the envelope release time in msec.

methods.name: SetSpread
methods.doc: Sets the amount of spread of the oscillators. [0.0, 1.0]

methods.name: SetStereoDelayFeedback
methods.doc: Sets the amount of stereo delay feedback [0.0, 1.0]

methods.name: SetStereoDelayIsEnabled
methods.doc: Sets whether not stereo delay is enabled.

methods.name: SetStereoDelayMode
methods.doc: Sets whether not stereo delay is enabled.

methods.name: SetStereoDelayRatio
methods.doc: Sets the amount of stereo delay ratio between left and right delay lines [0.0, 1.0]

methods.name: SetStereoDelayTime
methods.doc: Sets the amount of stereo delay time in msec.

methods.name: SetStereoDelayWetlevel
methods.doc: Sets the amount of stereo delay wetlevel [0.0, 1.0]

methods.name: SetSustainGain
methods.doc: Sets the envelope sustain gain value.

methods.name: SetSynthPreset
methods.doc: Sets the preset struct for the synth
